profile:
Thank you for visiting Envirotech Insulation and Envirotech Electrical Services Inc.   
 
We are a dual service organization, offering a full range of electrical services for commercial and residential, along with specializing in retrofit wall insulation, attic insulation, and garage ceiling insulation applications. We also offer removal of insulation. 
 
Over 28 years licensed in the electrical trade, with experience in residential, commercial, industrial, microfit and net metering solar installations, backup generators, Generlink transfer switches, aluminum wiring.  A member of the ACP program for electrical contractors, we can take care of all your electrical needs.
 
**We were the preferred electrical contractor for HGTV's DECKED OUT during their last season.**
 
Envirotech Insulation specializes in installing cellulose in walls, cavities, knee walls, garage ceilings, attics, and other area that might be inaccessible without having to remove plaster, or drywall.  Through infrared we can identify problem areas of air leakage, and missing or lack of insulation to help suggest the proper recommendations for increasing the energy efficiency and comfort in your home. We also offer dense packed cellulose insulation for soundproofing/noise reduction applications. We ensure intake venting is appropriate from the soffits, and exhaust fan are connected properly.  
www.envirotechinsulation.ca
 
Please contact us for an estimate, and to learn more about the products and services we offer

profile:
KV Bear Electrical specializes in residential services and are following all the health and safety guidelines as directed by the province of Ontario to ensure the safety of our customers and employees. With over 15 years of experience, whether you need a small wiring fix or the installation of state-of-the-art smart home, we get the job done right. We provide a thorough consultation to explain your available options. With that information, you can choose the scope of work thatâ€™s right for your home and for your budget. We strive to save you both time and money by combining experience, high quality parts and equipment, and exceptional service. We will stick with the job until you are satisfied. 


RESIDENTIAL SERVICES: 

Repair and Replacement, Trouble Shooting, Problem Solving, Renovations, Panel Upgrades, Rewiring, New Sockets, Light Fixture Installations, Installation, Recessed Lighting, Indoor/Outdoor Lighting, Ceiling Fans, Hot Tubs, Surge Protection, testing and more...

Inspection and Testing: Before we start any job, we ensure that we know all the services you need. We are up to date with current regulations as well as fully licensed and insured.

Our Business Hours are: 8:00 am to 5:00 pm

profile:
Don't consider calling the bigger companies before you try Fuzion Electric. You won't find better pricing from an insured, registered electrical contractor. 
Independently owned and locally operated; ESA# 7008025; Let us get the job done right, on budget and on time...GUARANTEED.
 
Neatness, Tidiness, and doing things safely are of our biggest concerns.  
There are way too many hacks out there without the proper knowledge.  
Electrical is one thing best left to the pro's so let us get the job done right.  Every job is inspected and the homeowner/business owner receives that documentation.  
That's not just the right way to do it, but it also offers piece of mind.

Feel free to contact me to find out more.
Matt 
(289) 200-2199
Please leave message if I don't answer your call and I will return it ASAP
